subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer, who gave up two runs and seven hits in six and a third innings, is the first pitcher to start 13-0 since the Red Sox’ Roger Clemens in 1986.
snippet: Max Scherzer, who gave up two runs and seven hits in six and a third innings, is the first pitcher to start 13-0 since the Red Sox’ Roger Clemens in 1986.
